definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.

sentences.english: And the site's cheeky bravado rubs salt in the wounds.

sentences.english: In addition, wounds and abscesses from fighting may need treatment.

definition: variant of 包紮|包扎[bao1 za1]
to wrap up/to pack/to bind up (a wound)
to form a scar/to form a scab
